title: Professional Newborn Baby Sitting
description: Our Professional Newborn Baby Sitting service provides specialized care for infants. Our caregivers are trained in neonatal handling, feeding schedules, and sleep monitoring. We ensure your baby stays in a safe, hygienic, and nurturing environment while you are away. This service focuses on building a gentle routine for the newborn and peace of mind for parents.

qna.question: Are the sitters trained for emergencies?
qna.answer: Yes, all our sitters are certified in infant CPR and first aid.

qna.question: Can I request a specific feeding schedule?
qna.answer: Absolutely, we strictly follow the routine provided by parents.

title: Toddler Play & Learn Companion
description: This service is designed for active toddlers who need engagement and supervision. Our caregivers facilitate age-appropriate educational games, storytelling, and outdoor playtime. We focus on both safety and cognitive development through play-based learning methods.

qna.question: Do you provide educational materials?
qna.answer: We use the toys and books available at your home to maintain familiarity.

title: Compassionate Elderly Companionship
description: Elderly individuals often need a companion to talk to and assist with daily movements. Our caregivers provide emotional support, engage in conversations, help with walking, and assist in light daily tasks to ensure the seniors don't feel lonely.

qna.question: Do they help with medication?
qna.answer: Yes, they provide timely reminders for all prescribed medicines.

title: Post-Hospitalization Sick Care
description: Recovering from surgery or a major illness requires professional attention. This service offers dedicated care for patients who need wound dressing reminders, vital sign monitoring, and specialized diet management under medical guidelines.

qna.question: Is this service available for COVID patients?
qna.answer: Yes, we have specialized caregivers with PPE for contagious care.

title: Dementia & Alzheimer’s Support
description: Caring for patients with memory loss requires patience and skill. Our caregivers are trained specifically to handle the behavioral changes and safety needs of seniors with Dementia and Alzheimer’s.

qna.question: Are your staff trained for memory care?
qna.answer: Yes, they undergo specific behavioral management training.

title: School Pickup & After-School Care
description: Busy parents can rely on us for safe school pickups and supervised after-school activities. We ensure the child finishes their homework and has a healthy snack until the parents return home.

qna.question: Do you provide transportation?
qna.answer: We can accompany the child in your vehicle or use verified ride-sharing.

title: Overnight Newborn Care
description: Get the sleep you need while our night-nanny takes care of the baby. We handle midnight feedings, diaper changes, and soothing, so parents can wake up refreshed.

qna.question: What are the timings for night shifts?
qna.answer: Usually from 10 PM to 6 AM, but it can be customized.

title: Stroke Recovery Assistance
description: Post-stroke care involves physical therapy support and speech practice. Our caregivers help patients follow their rehabilitation exercises and manage daily living activities safely.

qna.question: Do they provide physiotherapy?
qna.answer: They assist with exercises prescribed by your physiotherapist.

title: Elderly Palliative Care
description: Providing comfort and quality of life for seniors with serious, chronic illnesses. This service focuses on pain management support and emotional comfort for both the patient and the family.

qna.question: Is this medical or non-medical?
qna.answer: We provide non-medical comfort care and work alongside your medical team.

title: Special Needs Child Care
description: Carefully selected sitters for children with Autism, ADHD, or other physical disabilities. We focus on sensory-friendly interaction and maintaining the child's specific routine.

qna.question: Are the caregivers specialized?
qna.answer: Yes, we assign staff with experience in special education or therapy.

title: Short-term Post-Surgery Care
description: Ideal for patients recovering from minor surgeries who need help for 3-7 days. We assist with bathing, dressing, and moving around the house safely.

qna.question: Can I book for just 2 days?
qna.answer: Yes, short-term booking is available for this service.

title: Elderly Exercise & Yoga Companion
description: Physical activity is vital for seniors. Our active caregivers accompany seniors during morning walks or help them perform light yoga and stretching exercises at home.

qna.question: Is the caregiver a yoga teacher?
qna.answer: They are fitness companions trained in basic elderly exercises.
